resources.string: Add an allergy by typing it in. Spelling must be correct; not case-sensitive.
Scan a label and check for allergens
This allergy is severe enough to avoid traces
If you are only allergic to certain items in the group above, add them here and separate items with commas (ex. pistachios, walnuts)
This item was flagged for Nuts. It is not recommended that you ingest it.
